content.data:
[Y]Raster Tricks
[W]Colour changes mid-frame.
[c][m.]
[W]Raster bars and split screens rely on
[W]precise timing of register and palette
[W]updates.
[W]Debugging with border colour markers
[W]helps locate drift quickly.
[c][m.]
[G]- Use cycle budgets.
[G]- Mark timing visually.
[G]- Retest after every tweak.
[m][m-]
[Y]TIP
[C]Lock one effect before adding the
[C]next.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
